content: You are the best! “ he’s a Fox and Friend’s kinda guy and you’re a sentient being” — YES! YES! YES! — As much as you love being in front of a crowd.. (Joking! I did pay attention to that piece) If you ever decide to do stand-up, I will buy out all the front row seats! I’ll need the room to jump up & down screaming with laughter and spewing coffee/beer/wine out my nostrils…
